description:
Mikado, Mukae, Sakaki, and Erika head to Sensei`s house. It`s necessary for Hiyakawa`s sake too. But Sensei has used the sinister power he`s gathered to block the roads, so they can`t move forward. As they try to force a way through, a portion of the power swoops down, enveloping Sakaki. But all it does is pass through him...?! It seems that the effects of what Erika did to save his life have made Sakaki "deathless."
Source: crunchyroll
